title: Summer Beats Festival
description: A three-day outdoor music festival featuring performances from top artists across various genres.

title: Modern Art Showcase
description: An exhibition featuring contemporary artworks from emerging artists, focusing on themes of identity and culture.

title: City Marathon for Health
description: A marathon event aimed at raising funds for local health initiatives, open to runners of all levels.

title: Annual Science Explorers Fair
description: A platform for students to present their science projects and innovations to the community and judges.
